avalancheActivity.comment: As a consequence of new snow and a moderate to strong wind from southerly directions, further wind slabs will form in the course of the day adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. Fresh and somewhat older wind slabs can be released easily or naturally in all aspects above the tree line. The prevalence of avalanche prone locations and likelihood of triggering will increase with altitude. As a consequence of the precipitation more frequent moist loose snow avalanches are to be expected, even large ones. On steep grassy slopes more medium-sized gliding avalanches are possible.
avalancheActivity.highlights: A critical avalanche situation will prevail.

snowpackStructure.comment: Over a wide area 15 to 60 cm of snow will fall until Monday above approximately 2000 m. Until Monday the wind will be strong to storm force. In places that are protected from the wind wind slabs formed. The fresh wind slabs are lying on soft layers. The weather conditions as the day progresses will give rise to a loss of strength within the snowpack.

tendency.comment: As a consequence of warming during the day avalanches are to be expected as the day progresses, even quite large ones.

avalancheActivity.comment: As a consequence of the precipitation moist loose snow avalanches are to be expected, in particular medium-sized ones. Fresh and somewhat older wind slabs can be released easily by a single winter sport participant above the tree line. On very steep grassy slopes more gliding avalanches are possible. The prevalence of the avalanche prone locations will increase with altitude. On steep grassy slopes more medium-sized gliding avalanches are possible.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The danger of moist and wet avalanches will increase during the day. In addition the wind slabs should be taken into account.

snowpackStructure.comment: Over a wide area 2 to 50 cm of snow will fall until Monday above approximately 1800 m. The rain will give rise as the day progresses to a loss of strength within the snowpack. The wind will be strong to storm force. In the vicinity of peaks wind slabs will form.

tendency.comment: As a consequence of warming during the day avalanches are to be expected as the day progresses, in particular medium-sized ones.
